title: Achievement gallery

properties.name: description
properties.value: An achievement gallery is a room in a player-owned house in which the player can display their various accomplishments. It can be created at level 80 Construction for 200,000. Only one achievement gallery can be built per player.

content:
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Achievement gallery
Released25 August 2016 (Update)
Icon
Construction level80
Cost200,000
Door layout
Achievement gallery

An achievement gallery is a room in a player-owned house in which the player can display their various accomplishments. It can be created at level 80 Construction for 200,000. Only one achievement gallery can be built per player.

If the player uses an orange spicy stew to boost their Construction by 5 levels, it is possible to build an achievement gallery at level 75 Construction.

There are 6 hotspots available:

  • Adventure log space
  • Altar space
  • Boss lair space
  • Display space
  • Jewellery box space
  • Quest list space

Contents

  • 1 Adventure log
  • 2 Altar
  • 3 Boss lair
  • 4 Display
  • 5 Jewellery box
  • 6 Quest list
  • 7 Trivia

Adventure log[edit | edit source]

The adventure log allows players to show off to other players the following:

  • Slayer Kill Log
  • Boss Kill Log
  • Champions defeated in the Champions' Challenge minigame
  • Collection log
  • Counters
    • Number of Duel Arena wins/losses
    • Rank in Last Man Standing
    • Number of Treasure Trails completed
    • Number of chompy birds killed
    • White Knight Ranking and black knight kill score
    • Fastest run time of the TzHaar Fight Cave
    • Fastest run time of the Inferno
    • Fastest Zulrah kill time
    • Fastest Vorkath kill time
    • Fastest Galvek kill time
    • Fastest Grotesque Guardians kill time
    • Fastest Alchemical Hydra kill time
    • Fastest Hespori kill time
    • Fastest Nightmare kill time
    • Fastest run time of The Gauntlet
    • Fastest run time of The Corrupted Gauntlet
    • Fastest Fragment of Seren kill time
    • Fastest run time of the Chambers of Xeric
    • Fastest run time of the Chambers of Xeric's Challenge Mode
    • Number of high-level gambles done within Barbarian Assault
    • Number of peaceful barbarian spirits laid to rest

Altar[edit | edit source]

The altar hot spot allows players to build a spellbook-switching altar. They can be used to switch spellbooks without having to travel to the overworld spellbook-switching altars or have the Magic skillcape.

Level Altar Materials Experience Cost

Magic stone
Ancient signet
Pharaoh's sceptre 		1,490 5,023,689

90 Occult altar Materials for the other two altars the player hasn't built
(excluding the magic stone and limestone bricks) 		3,445 9,053,691

Boss lair[edit | edit source]

The boss lair allows a player to build a fancy display showing off various bosses. In order to display a boss lair, players must have killed the boss once, and use the jar dropped by that boss on the display.

The display can be configured to show any boss whose jar has been added to it. Once put in the display, players can remove the jar should they wish to do so, but must put the jar back if they wish to display that boss again.

Level Boss lair Materials Experience Cost
87 Boss lair display Steel bar x4
Molten glass x5
Mahogany plank x10 		1,483 23,436

Display[edit | edit source]

The mounted display displays certain items to show off the player's items or wealth.

Level Display Materials Experience Cost
80 Mounted emblem Marble block
Gold leaf
Decorative emblem 		5,300 468,811
80 Mounted coins Marble block
Gold leaf
100,000,000 		800 100,468,811
80 Cape hanger Marble block
Gold leaf 		800 468,811

Jewellery box[edit | edit source]

The jewellery box can store various teleportation jewellery. Each box will provide unlimited teleports to locations provided by the enchanted jewellery.

Jewellery boxes are constructed in upgrades: before a higher level box can be built, the player must first build the one before it. Bank notes are NOT accepted, each item must be brought.

Quest list[edit | edit source]

The quest list displays the player's progress through every quest and miniquest. It will show which quests the player has completed, started and not started.

Level Quest list Materials Experience Cost
80 Quest list Papyrus x10
Gold leaf 		310 137,320

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The game cache reveals an item named "Achievement gallery" (), which appears to be intended to be the icon that is displayed in the in-game Construction guide. This was replaced instead with the icon for the marble adventure log.
